RelatedSentence: Adilabad : Majlis-e-Ittehadul Muslimeen workers and leaders took out a protest rally on Monday in Adilabad town against the alleged conspiracy to kill party leader Akbaruddin Owaisi .

The MIM activists demanded that the government should provide Z - plus security and bullet proof vehicles to Mr Akbaruddin and Asadduddin Owaisi as they were facing threats from anti-social elements .
